Title: Too Much of a Good Thing? Chronic IFN Fuels Resistance to Cancer Immunotherapy
Abstract: © 2016 Elsevier Inc.Immune checkpoint blockade (ICB) is revolutionizing cancer medicine, yet the molecular basis of resistance remains unclear. In a recent issue of Cell, Benci et al. (2016) demonstrate that sustained interferon signaling is central to the development of PD-L1-dependent and -independent resistance to ICB.
